search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Aesthetic Record EMR (aesthetic-record-emr.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Aesthetic Record EMR is [https://www.aestheticrecord.com/pricing](https://www.aestheticrecord.com/pricing).

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The pricing page was not directly accessible, but a free trial of 14 days is mentioned.
